title: Hugo Macedo

title: Hugo Macedo
text: Hello, my name is Hugo, and I am a researcher at the Institute for Applied Economic Research, where I primarily work on the Atlas of the Brazilian State. My main interests include social inequality and enhancing access to data, and I believe that science evolves through transparency. Therefore, you can expect to see me promoting and engaging with open-source and open access initiatives.
